abstract: Critics from The New York Times will be squashed into many of the clubs during the CMJ Music Marathon alongside other music fans and chroniclers. But we can't be everywhere. This year, we invite readers to join us in appraising certain CMJ shows on Twitter.
snippet: Critics from The New York Times will be squashed into many of the clubs during the CMJ Music Marathon alongside other music fans and chroniclers. But we can't be everywhere. This year, we invite readers to join us in appraising certain CMJ shows on...
lead_paragraph: The deluge begins Tuesday when the 31st annual CMJ Music Marathon, which has grown into a five-day overload of musicians, begins with acts who are all hoping for some kind of attention: a record deal, a gig, a blog post, a tweet.

headline.main: CMJ Music Marathon Requires Critical Reinforcements
